availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Columbus, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Married to Ann E. Bradley. Father of Marcellus Bradley, Eugene Bradley, Kate Bradley, Gennett Bradley, and Anna Bradley. Owned three enslaved persons in Graves County, Kentucky, in 1850. Attorney in Columbus in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Graves County, District 1, p. 120.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, Columbus District, p. 41.
